name: Zakya Rakshasa
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Limited Magic Immunity: The rakshasa can\'t be affected or detected by spells of 1st level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The rakshasa\'s weapon attacks are magical.
traits.Martial Prowess (1/Turn): When the rakshasa hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) damage of the weapon's type, and the creature must make a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Strength saving throw. On a failure, the rakshasa can push the creature up to 10 feet away from it, knock the creature prone, or make the creature drop one item it is holding of the rakshasa\'s choice.
